Description: Ankle sock in red wool; Division between big toe and other toes for wear with sandle, slit at front of opening; Technique of needle netting; Edges: cast off edges around opening; Sewing: constructed from a single thread, in theory, using S spun 5? Z ply yarn
Curator's comments: Previous location Cupboard 64, small grey box; Information from Hero Granger-Taylor (11.6.90)
Condition: Good; some holes and some discolouration.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
